metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25221 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Libde265 v1.0.10 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the derive_spatial_luma_vector_prediction function in motion.cc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.11-1
libde265-examples - 1.0.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.11-1').
